author: Eric Piazzoni
comment: I really like the watch face and all the features.  However, it killed my watch battery and had to switch back to my old watch face.  I'll try it again to see if it's improved...but a watch that runs out of juice after about 14 hours doesn't help me.

author: Larry Zimmerman
comment: Nice watch face but is a energy hog

author: Jason Wilkins
comment: Love it but, the world time settings stopped working. Fix please.
title: Great Watchface

author: Xtian E.
title: Very useful app with a lot of details

author: Lex J
comment: Great Android gear watch face! Awesome display layout with lots of great info. Round of color options to really make it match your style

author: Derrick Matthews
comment: Had to delete and download again,time and date stop working

author: Matt Cooksey
comment: I read the reviews suggesting battery drain being an issue so after I installed it I made sure to go through the settings and turn off access to GPS and set the city where I live in manually.  I turned off the speed feature, yet my watch died a good 6 hours earlier than normal only lasting 8 hours.  Until this is resolved I'm deeming this watch face unusable since my watch battery to begin with is fairly poor (Moto360).

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your helpful feedback.
Would you please give us your situation more in detail.
I'd like to improve.Please feel free to contact our email.
Thank you.

title: Major battery drain

author: The Farmer
comment: Got it to work pretty quickly after reading other reviews. Works like a charm now. Thanks

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank for your feedback.
The watch face setting icon is shown on 'Android Wear' app on your phone. Not on your phone's home screen.
Please tap 'Android Wear' app's icon on your phone
After that,You can find the watch face icon in the 'Face List' on Android Wear app and tap watch face icon to setup.
Please feel free to contact our email.Thank you.

title: Just had to figure out how to customize it.
